author: paras@getbindu.com
name: instagram-post-agent
description: AI Crew for Instagram is a multi-agent AI system that collaborates to ideate, write, design, and optimize Instagram posts—handling captions, hashtags, visuals, and posting strategy to maximize reach, engagement, and brand consistency. 🚀

environment_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for LLM calls
Mem0 API key for memory operations
Serper API key for search functionality
Browserless API key for web scraping
